Description: Green glazed composition shabti of the vizier Bakenrenef with a black painted lappet-wig, a modelled face with ears and a beard, incised crossed hands holding two hoes, the front of the leg section is inscribed with incised hieroglyphs, the back of one shoulder is decorated with an incised representation of a seed-basket; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Lt-Gen Augustus W H Meyrick
